official_title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide for removal by recall of certain elected official officials, and to authorize initiatives and referenda.

summary.text: Amends the Organic Act of Guam to authorize initiatives and referenda in Guam. Sets forth the referendum procedure. Subjects the following Guam public officials to recall: (1) the Lieutenant Governor; (2) the members of the legislature; (3) village and municipal commissioners and assistant commissioners; and (4) district school board representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide for removal by recall of certain elected official officials, and to authorize initiatives and referenda.
